title: Is it better to buy 2018 iPad Pro with Magic Keyboard or 2020 iPad Pro with Smart Keyboard? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suppose I’d buy the 2020 iPad and make do with an older keyboard or possibly get the smart keyboard. Why? I view the keyboard as an accessory (because it is). It can be purchased or upgraded at a later date. While I don’t have an immediate need for Lidar at this time, maybe in the future I will. The GPU upgrade is so minimal you’d never see a performance difference. The extra memory (6GB in the 2020 vs 4GB in the 2018 - assuming it’s less than 1TB storage) would also help future proof the device.
